Race.SpecificTitle: Village of French Settlement -- Appoint Marshal - BOA
Race.FullText: Shall the Mayor of the Village of French Settlement be authorized to appoint a marshal who shall be the Chief of Police, said appointment to be confirmed upon the approval of the Board of Aldermen of the Village of French Settlement, with the first such appointment to be made and effective at the end of the term of the marshal/Chief of Police in office at the time of the election on this proposition, in accordance with La. R.S. 33:381.2?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 4 -- $32 Service Charge - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 4 Proposition
(Service Charge Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 4 of Livingston Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to renew the levy and collection of a service charge in an amount of $32.00 per annum (an estimated $713,632 is reasonably expected at this time to be collected for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for each residential or commercial structure, to be assessed to persons owning each such structure, whether occupied or unoccupied, located wholly or partly within the boundaries of the District, and persons owning the ground upon which each such structure is situated, for fire protection services, all as provided in R.S.40:1502.1?
